medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment by which the sender must uniquely identify the Product Data Message by means of its name and number and when necessary its function. Data element 1225 may be used to identify updates to a previously sent PRODAT message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying general dates and, when relevant, times related to the whole message. The segment must be specified at least once to identify the Product Data Message date. The Date/time/period segment within other Segment groups should be used whenever the date/time/period requires to be logically related to another specified data item, for example the availability date for a specified line item (SG8-DTM following LIN).

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment indicating country of origin.

medi:segment.name: Item description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IMD, A segment providing the product family name commonly used with all products identified within the message in free format and when necessary identifying the language used. It may be repeated as well to provide the name in other languages.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, used when additional information is needed relevant for all products described in the actual message but cannot be accommodated within other segments. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

medi:segment.name: Product group information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PGI, A segment to identify a product group, price group or tariff group which is applicable to the whole message.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to identify technical rules applicable for all products contained in the message and the rules' issue dates.

medi:segment.name: Technical rules
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TRU, A segment identifying technical rules and conditions relevant for the whole message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the technical rules' issue date.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to identify governmental or legal trade restrictions and relevant commodities.

medi:segment.name: Requirements and conditions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RCS, A segment indicating that and which governmental or legal trade restrictions apply to all products described in the actual message.

medi:segment.name: Additional product id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PIA, A segment to identify the commodities relevant for the identified trade restrictions.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments for giving references and where necessary, their dates, relating to the whole message.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference by its type and number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and, or related to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments identifying the parties with associated information relevant to the whole message.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying names and addresses of the parties, in coded or clear form, and their functions relevant to the message. At least one NAD-segment should be provided, for example the manufacturer, the supplier or message generator. It is recommended that, if possible, only the coded form of the party ID should be specified.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments giving contact details of a specific person and, or department within the party identified in the NAD segment.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person and, or department, and their function, to whom communications should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication type and number for the contact specified in the CTA segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments used to provide references and where necessary, their dates, related to the party identified in the NAD segment.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference by its type and number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and, or time related to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments providing common product characteristic and common characteristic details.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic/class id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CCI, A segment to identify common product characteristic and, or the characteristic name and characteristic relevance for the business process.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic value
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CAV, A segment to specify common product characteristic by value in either coded form or in free format.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
MEA, A segment indicating characteristic values being physical measurements (including measurable quantities and percentages) related to specified product family or group characteristics (for example voltage, percentage of material contained) and where relevant measurement ranges. The MEA-segment is repeatable to allow the indication of a number of applicable measurable values, for example one electric appliance may be switchable for different voltages: 110V, 220V, 240V and 380V.
4.1.2 Detail section
Information to be provided in the Detail section:

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: SG11-SG12-SG13-SG14-SG15-SG16-SG17-SG19-SG20- SG21 A group of segments providing details of a single product. This segment group may be repeated to give subline details.

medi:segment.name: Line item
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LIN, A segment identifying the line item by the line item number and the product by its item number. Detailed product description can be specified using the following segment group: SG9 (IMD-FTX). Data element 1229 may be used to identify the current line item updating the correspondent line item of a previously sent PRODAT message.

medi:segment.name: Additional product id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PIA, A segment providing either additional identification of the product specified in the LIN segment or any substitute product identification.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying date and, ,or time or period details relating to the line item only, for example the date of first or last availability of specified product.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment enabling the physical measurements of the item to be specified where this is required for full identification of the product. Any measurements must refer to the product in its unpacked form, for example thickness of plastic film, length, weight, etc. Note: Measurement related to product characteristics are to be given by MEA within the item characteristic group.

medi:segment.name: Handling instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HAN, A segment providing information on required handling of the actual line item's product and additionally, if required, notifying hazardous materials.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment to identify documents required with the identified product, for example the SAFHAZ message.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, used when additional information on the actual product is needed but cannot be accommodated within other segments (for free format product description FTX in segment group 9 is to be used only). In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

medi:segment.name: Product group information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PGI, A segment to identify a product group, price group or tariff group which is applicable to the current line item only.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments for naming, identification and short description of the product specified within the PRODAT message line item. This group may be repeated to provide name and, or description in one or more other languages.

medi:segment.name: Item description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IMD, Segment providing the given product name in free format and when necessary identifying the language used. It may be repeated as well to provide name in one more other languages.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in clear form, to describe the named product and when necessary identifying the language used. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments to identify technical rules applicable for the actual product and the rules' issue dates.

medi:segment.name: Technical rules
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TRU, A segment identifying technical rules and conditions relevant for the whole message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the technical rules' issue date.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments to identify governmental or legal trade restrictions and relevant commodities.

medi:segment.name: Requirements and conditions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RCS, A segment indicating that and which governmental or legal trade restrictions apply to the actual product.

medi:segment.name: Additional product id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PIA, A segment to identify the commodities relevant for the identified trade restrictions.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments to provide quantity for the specified product and where relevant related date and time information for example minimum delivery batch, indication of manufacturer's capacity within a given period.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify quantities related to the product.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating that date or time details relate to the quantity, for example number of time units needed to manufacture the specified product quantity.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 13: A segment group to specify the estimated value of an item only for budgetary purposes. This segment group may specify values over a given quantity range and for a current currency.

medi:segment.name: Price details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PRI, A segment to specify the estimated value of an item for information purposes only.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment to specify the currency of the value.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment to specify the quantity range where the estimated value is applicable.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 14: A group of segments providing product characteristic and-product characteristic details.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic/class id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CCI, A segment to identify product characteristic and, or the characteristic name and characteristic relevance for the business process.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic value
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CAV, A segment to specify common product characteristic by value in either coded form or in free format.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment indicating characteristic values being physical measurements (including measurable quantities and percentages) related to specified product characteristics (for example voltage, percentage of material contained) and where relevant measurement ranges. The MEA-segment is repeatable to allow the indication of a number of applicable measurable values, for example one electric appliance may be switchable for different voltages: 110V, 220V, 240V and 380V.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 15: A group of segments providing information on origin and, or special conditions applicable to the product and - if required - relevant percentages.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment indicating that the product is subject to special conditions owing to origin, customs preference or commercial factors.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment providing a percentage and percentage basis related to the additional information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 16: A group of segments giving references related to the product specified in the LIN segment.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the reference related to the product by its number and type and where appropriate a line within a document.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and, or time related to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 17: A group of segments identifying the parties with associated information.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying names and addresses of the parties related to the identified product, in coded or clear form, and their functions for example supplier, warehouse, service. It is recommended that, if possible, only the coded form of the party ID should be specified.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 18: A group of segments giving contact details of a specific person and, or department within the party identified in the NAD segment.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person and, or department, and their function, to whom communications should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication type and number for the contact specified in the CTA segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 19: A group of segments containing information about dangerous goods.

medi:segment.name: Dangerous goods
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DGS, A segment providing dangerous goods information by using relevant dangerous goods identification.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify quantity for the given dangerous goods.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in clear form, to identify dangerous goods. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver process this segment manually.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 20: A group of segments identifying product specific packaging of the goods identified in the line item, its physical dimensions and marks (for example special packaging relevant for the product).

medi:segment.name: Package
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAC, A segment specifying the number of packages and the physical type of packaging for the product, for example, package type.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment specifying physical measurements of packages described in the PAC segment,-for example cube or gross weight, stack factor.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying the type of quantity and the quantity related to the package, for example quantity of products packed into the package.

medi:segment.name: Handling instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HAN, A segment providing information on required handling of the actual line item's product depending on packaging and additionally, if required, notifying hazardous materials.

medi:segment.name: Package identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCI, A segment specifying markings and labels used on individual physical units (packages) described in the PAC segment, for example item number of packaging unit.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 21: A group of segments to specify hierarchical connections from the given product to higher or lower levelled products.

medi:segment.name: Hierarchy information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HYN, A segment to identify hierarchical connections from the given product to higher or lower levelled products and its function within the logistic chain. Data element 1229 may be used to identify the current line item's hierarchical structure updating the correspondent line item's hierarchical structure of a previously sent PRODAT message.

medi:segment.name: Additional product id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PIA, A segment providing either additional identification of the product specified in the HYN segment or any substitute product identification.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying the child product's quantity contained within the identified parent product.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 22: A group of segments to provide references linked to the hierarchical item and where necessary the reference date.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the reference linked to the hierarchical item, for example the drawing number on a wiring diagram.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and, or time related to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 23: A group of segments to identify characteristics depending on the product's use within the specified hierarchy.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic/class id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CCI, A segment to identify product characteristic and, or the characteristic name and characteristic relevance for the business process.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic value
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CAV, A segment to specify product characteristic by value in either coded form or in free format.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment indicating characteristic values being physical measurements (including measurable quantities and percentages) related to specified product characteristics (for example voltage, percentage of material contained) and where relevant measurement ranges. The MEA-segment is repeatable to allow the indication of a number of applicable measurable values, for example one electric appliance may be switchable for different voltages: 110V, 220V, 240V and 380V.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 24: A segment group to specify party dependent information for the actual product in the given hierarchy.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party preferably in coded form to which specific product and hierarchical item characteristics apply.

medi:segment.name: Additional product id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PIA, A segment providing additional identification(s) of the hierarchically linked product that are specific to the identified party, for example an additional number from another origin to identify the higher or lower levelled product relevant to the identified party.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying the child product's quantity contained within the identified parent product if specially defined by the named party.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 25: A group of segments to identify characteristics depending on the product's use within the hierarchy specific to the identified party.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic/class id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CCI, A segment to identify product characteristic and, or the characteristic name and characteristic relevance for the business process.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic value
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CAV, A segment to specify product-characteristic by value in either coded form or in free format.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment indicating characteristic values being physical measurements (including measurable quantities and percentages) related to specified product characteristics (for example voltage, percentage of material contained) and where relevant measurement ranges. The MEA-segment is repeatable to allow the indication of a number of applicable measurable values, for example one electric appliance may be switchable for different voltages: 110V, 220V, 240V and 380V.
